mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_order ( order_idx, member_idx, method_idx, payment_id, order_type, order_status, order_name, order_price, order_currency, order_regdate, order_paydate ) VALUES ( payment_order_seq.nextval, #{member_idx}, #{method_idx}, #{payment_id}, #{order_type}, #{order_status}, #{order_name}, #{order_price}, #{order_currency}, #{order_regdate}, #{order_paydate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM payment_order WHERE member_idx = #{member_idx} ORDER BY order_regdate DESC
